titleStmt.title: The office and vse of the morall law of God in the dayes of the gospell iustified, and explained at large by Scriptures, Fathers, and other orthodoxe diuines, so farre as occasion was giuen by a scandalous pamphlet sent abroad of late into the hands of diuers good Christians, pretending great reason and reading for the vtter abrogating and abolishing of the whole Law of Moses since the death of Christ. By William Hinde, sometimes fellow of Queenes Colledge in Oxford, and now preacher of Gods Word at Bunbury in Cheshire.
titleStmt.author: Hinde, William, 1569?-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Thomas Pavier, and are to be sold at his shop in Ivy Lane,
